title: How to Cook Well with Rory O'Connell
overview: Rory O'Connell is one of Ireland's most experienced cookery teachers - he has been teaching people how to cook for more than 30 years, having co-founded the Ballymaloe Cookery School with sister Darina Allen. And in this series, How to Cook Well, Rory introduces the timeless, classic, and essential techniques which every cook needs to understand and implement if they want to cook well.
